meanings.definition: The quality or state of being prime.
meanings.sent1: The primenesses of the diamond made it highly valuable.
meanings.sent2: Her primenesses in the competition earned her a gold medal.
meanings.sent3: The primenesses of the cake was evident from the delighted smiles of the guests.
meanings.sent4: The primenesses of the sunrise painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The primenesses of the student's work was recognized with an award.

meanings.definition: The condition of being first in importance or degree.
meanings.sent1: The primenesses of safety in the workplace is crucial.
meanings.sent2: His primenesses in the company secured him the promotion.
meanings.sent3: The primenesses of the dessert caused a rush to get the last piece.
meanings.sent4: The primenesses of the leader's speech inspired the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The primenesses of honesty should never be underestimated.

meanings.definition: The state of being in the best or most perfect condition.
meanings.sent1: The primenesses of the garden was admired by all who visited.
meanings.sent2: The car was restored to its primenesses after the thorough cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The primenesses of the weather made it a perfect day for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The primenesses of the painting captured the artist's skill.
meanings.sent5: The primenesses of the dress made her feel like a princess.
